懜懜懜

懜字的基本解释

懜
mèng
不明。

懜
méng
惭愧。

懜
měng
古同“懵”。心窍迷乱。不清醒，无知。

懜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［méng］［měng］
［《廣韻》莫紅切，平東，明。］
［《集韻》母揔切，上蕫，明。］
昏昩；心迷乱。
[②]［méng］
［《廣韻》莫中切，平東，明。］
惭愧。

懜字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　懜； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页406第33
【唐韻】武亙切【集韻】【韻會】母亙切，?瞢去聲。【說文】不明也。从心夢聲。　又悶也。【集韻】或从瞢作懵，或从人作?。　又通作瞢。【周禮·春官·眂祲】掌十煇之法，六曰瞢。【註】日月瞢瞢無光也。與懜同。　又【韻會】莫鳳切，音夢。惛也。　又【集韻】母總切，音蠓。【廣韻】闇也。一曰心亂。本作懵。或从蒙作懞，或从夢作懜。　又【廣韻】【正韻】莫紅切【集韻】【韻會】謨蓬切，?音蒙。【集韻】本作懵，或从夢作懜。懜懜，無知貌。一曰慚也。　又【集韻】謨中切。本作儚。【爾雅·釋訓】儚儚，惛也。或作懜。　又【集韻】彌登切。與?顭通。義同。

懜字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
懜字的起名意思

暂无。

懜
Basic explanation of words
懜
mèng
unknown.
懜
méng
Ashamed.
懜
měng
Gu Tong is "stunned". Perplexed. Not sober, ignorant.
懜
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［méng］［měng］
["Guangyun" Mo Hongqie, Pingdong, Ming. ]
["Jiyun" mother cut, stirrup, Ming. ]
Faint; confused.
[②]［méng］
["Guangyun" Mo Zhongqi, Pingdong, Ming. ]
Ashamed.
懜
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　懜; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 406, 33
[Tang Yun] Wu Genqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Mother Genqie, go to the sound. [Said the text] Unknown. Dream sound from the heart.　It's bored again. [Ji Yun] Or from the 瞢 to stunned, or from the people?　It's all over again. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·眂祲】The method of palming the ten radiances, the six is 眂祲. [Note] There is no light in the sun and the moon. Same as 懜.　[Yunhui] Mo Fengqie, Yinmeng. Shame too.　[Jiyun] The mother always cuts, the sound is a midge. [Guang Yun] Dark also. One said confusion. This is dumbfounded. Either from blindness to blindness, or from dreams to misunderstanding.　[Guang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Mo Hongqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Mo Pengqie,? Yin Meng. [Jiyun] This is a foolish, or from a dream to a foolish. Suddenly, ignorant appearance. One said ashamed.　[Jiyun] Mo Zhongqie. This is 儚. 【Erya·Shixun】Wow, awkward. Or for 懜.　[Jiyun] Mi Dengqie again. Connect with? The same meaning.
懜
